title: Angela Lansbury
summary: Dame Angela Brigid Lansbury DBE (born 16 October 1925) is a British-Irish[2]-American actress and singer who has played many film, theatre and television roles. Her career has spanned almost eight decades, much of it in the United States. Her work has received much international attention and she is recognised as the earliest surviving Academy Award nominee and one of the last surviving stars from the Golden Age of Hollywood cinema.
